pages.text: $(li)The Plains is simple a biome with a flat grass terrain.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find vegetation like Oak Trees, Poppies, Dandenlions, Azure Bluets, Tulips, Oxeye Daidies, and Cornflowers.

$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l) can be found flying around this biome.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Plains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
